message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also includes a comprehensive setup service to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. I understand that this investment might be significant, but I am confident it will pay off in terms of efficiency and productivity gains. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details. Looking forward to potentially working with you.
